fields.Title of Presentation: On the Semantic and Pragmatic Uses of the Northern Paiute Applicative
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Society for the Study of the Indigenous Languages of the Americas
fields.Description/Abstract: Applicatives are typologically interesting verb-based morpho-syntactic constructions that involve the addition of a new core participant onto the event scene. This paper explores the discourse basis for one such construction in the Northern Paiute language.
